node.text:
The design of the Sri Lakshmi Suite at The Kovalam Palace is reminiscent of a classical bygone era and incorporates the best of both worlds. Enjoy a curated in-suite breakfast with an ocean view at this splendid Suite.

For bookings contact: +91 471 305 1234 | 1800 4252 2220
mail: reservations.kovalam@theraviz.com | reservations@theraviz.com
